overview: Se-hyeon and Jae-hyeok, married for three years, are a couple in their 30s who have no children yet. Se-hyeon, who Kwon Tae-gi came to visit, one day, at a reunion meeting, heard about a friend's private life and found a massage shop. He falls out of bed, startled by the embarrassing service he has experienced for the first time. Jae-hyeok, who felt sorry for Se-hyeon who had to wear a cast because of a wrist injury, asks him to hire a house helper for the housework, but the policeman he found is Kang-cheol, a house helper. Meanwhile, house helper 'Gangcheol' approached Se-hyeon from the beginning and was in charge of the massage on the day Se-hyeon's wrist was injured at the massage shop...
title: Surrogate husband
